FuncDef: This command creates an IP address range reserved for IES or VPLS services.

ParaDef.Info: The IP address prefix to include in the service prefix allocation in dotted decimal notation. Values-ipv4-prefix:|a.b.c.d (host bits must be 0) |, ipv4-prefix-length:|0 to 32|, ipv6-prefix:|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces)|, |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d|, |x:| [0 to FFFF]H, |d:| [0 to 255]D, ipv6-prefix-length:|0 to 128|.
When this option is specified, the addresses configured are exclusively used for services and cannot be assigned to network ports. Values-exclusive.

ExtraInfo: Default: no service-prefix - No IP addresses are reserved for services.
